price: 9. Ma wuusan ogeyn marka waxa ku jira qabuuraha la soo bixiyo.
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
